name: Chainsaw Ninja In Space
blurb: A stealth-based 2.5D platformer with multiple paths to victory including assassination, sabotage, and outright glorious destruction.

rewards.reward: Helper - For this level, you will be honored in our lengthy credits sequence at the end of the game. If you receive this award due to being in one of the "Member" tiers, you can also submit a picture or phrase you'd like displayed as part of your credit. Tasteful items only, please!
Donator - At this level, you will receive a free copy of the game upon release and the ability to say "I supported the brutal shredding of cyborg aliens," a mark of pride!
Supporter - At this level, you will receive an emailed zip of the concept art for the game in addition to all rewards from the lower tiers.

Kickstarter - At this level, you will receive full access to the beta builds as they go by and be invited to a private IRC channel where you can chat with the developers (yes, not just me) when we're online. We'll do our best to be online for at least an hour a day. You will also receive all awards from lower tiers.

Commissioner - If you don't really care about talking to the devs, there's always this tier. As a reward, you will receive a hand-drawn ninja scene from the hand of our concept artist. It could range anywhere from Ninja's First Plane Ride to Ninja In The Morning. In addition, you will receive all rewards from lower tiers. (Cannot be received by a higher tier)

Honored Kickstarter - If you donate to this level, you will be able to pick out a custom logo or image (only non-obscene images you are legally allowed to use in commercial projects) that will be the official logo for a room or character in the game. You will also be able to send us a news story featuring yourself to put on Cyborg Radio and receive all rewards from lower tiers.

Bronze Member - If you donate to this level, you will be able to design and include a weapon for the ninja/guards of your choice. This can be anything from throwing stars, to a shotgun, to a shoulder-powered plasma cannon. If you want someone or something in the game to fire it, they will fire it. You will also receive all awards from lower tiers.\r\n\r\nNote: The maximum number of additional weapons is twenty. These will be given on a first-come, first-served basis.

Silver Member - For this level, you will have the grand honor of customizing an in-game guard using a character sheet we will provide. This will include the guard's tendency towards pranking fellow guards, dedication to his job, bathroom break frequency, and much much more. In addition to that, you will receive ten copies of the game for distribution among your family and friends. You will also receive the awards from all lower tiers.

Gold Member - At this tier, you will get free access to me on Skype during the duration of the project. If I'm online, I'm free game. You will also receive all awards from lower tiers.\r\n\r\nLegalese: All topics discussed during the Skype chats pertaining to game ideas or mechanics may freely be used by me in the development of this project or any future projects.

Platinum Member - For this premium tier, I will either fly to you or fly you to me for a dinner at a local restaurant of your choice. This will include discussion of any topics you choose including game mechanics. You will also receive a skip-the-line pass for our booth at all gaming conventions we attend and all awards from lower tiers.

If you are located in a foreign country, the dinner will be replaced with a mailed box of goodies from the development team in addition to a scheduled Skype video chat of up to six hours.

Legalese: All topics discussed during the meal or Skype chat pertaining to game ideas or mechanics may freely be used by me in the development of this project or any future projects.
